text: The New Christy Minstrels were an American folk group. Notable former members include Glen Campbell (solo career; Rhinestone Cowboy), Barry McGuire (solo career; Eve of Destruction), Larry Ramos (member of The Association), and Jerry Yester (member of The Modern Folk Quartet and The Lovin' Spoonful). == References == Category:1961 establishments in the United States Category:American musical groups Category:Folk music groups Category:American Grammy Award winners Category:Musical groups established in 1961 Category:Sanremo Music Festival winners
title: The New Christy Minstrels
